name: MEATBALL (itch)
description:
Possible post-jam rebalanced version w/ more levels in the works.

I made a bunch of custom shader for this that I'm pretty proud of but it didn't work in webgl :(

Detailed description of abilities if you want them:

Guards

  • Shoot: fires a hitscan bullet that stops at the first guard/wall hit. goes over obstacles. (Fire at their feet! That's where their hitboxes are)
  • Heal: restores 2 HP

Obstacle

  • Regurgitate: fires a projectile
  • Shield: become immune to damage for a few seconds. 

Wires

  • Tether: Fires a projectile that prevents enemies from exiting the area.
  • Grapple: Dash to the position hit
